title: 我一開始念的是主流中文課程，因為我知道學好中文的重要性。

replies.msg:
「我一開始念的是主流中文課程，因為我知道學好中文的重要性。可是，我被安排學習程度淺易的中文課程，以『減輕』我的學習壓力，因為有人認為學習主流中文課程對我來說『太困難』。自此我的中文程度越來越差。」
"When I first started school, I pursued the local Chinese curriculum because I knew it is important to learn the language well. Nevertheless, I was told to switch to an easier Chinese curriculum so that I could be 'comfortable' for the entirety of my school life. I was told that it would be 'difficult' for me to learn the mainstream curriculum. I saw my language skills deteriorate."
